content: Here is a listing of the current work items by IHE IT Infrastructure (ITI) on FHIR https://healthcaresecprivacy.blogspot.com.es/2017/05/ihe-iti-on-fhir.html
Generally: Update to STU3 of the MHD, PDQm, PIXm, mACM, and RESTful ATNA profiles from last year.
Adding a profile for non-patient files (such as stylesheets, configurations, policy documents, etc). - Using DocumentReference
Adding a profile for Provider Directory (using the use-usecases from HPD and CSD) - Organization, Location, Practitioner, PractitionerRole, HealthcareServices, Binary, OperationOutcome, Bundle
Adding a profile-of-profiles to provide Data Element access given Document Exchange (XDS)
